headline: 5 CFO tips for averting layoff mistakes: Gartner
summary: Common missteps include spreading cost-savings goals evenly across functions and adhering to inflexible rules like first-in-first-out, according to the Gartner report.

raw.headline: 5 CFO tips for averting layoff mistakes: Gartner
raw.summary: Common missteps include spreading cost-savings goals evenly across functions and adhering to inflexible rules like first-in-first-out, according to the Gartner report.

headline: This Was the Top-Performing Stock in the S&P 500 in August 2025
summary: A 24% gain in one month sounds too good to be true. But for this beaten-down stock, it was a welcome shot of redemption after a brutal July.

raw.headline: This Was the Top-Performing Stock in the S&P 500 in August 2025
raw.summary: A 24% gain in one month sounds too good to be true. But for this beaten-down stock, it was a welcome shot of redemption after a brutal July.

headline: Gartner predicts Fortune 500 companies won’t eliminate human agents anytime soon
summary: “At the end of the day do we think there will be fewer agents? Yes. But a fully agentless future is not going to happen,” Gartner’s Kathy Ross said.

raw.headline: Gartner predicts Fortune 500 companies won’t eliminate human agents anytime soon
raw.summary: “At the end of the day do we think there will be fewer agents? Yes. But a fully agentless future is not going to happen,” Gartner’s Kathy Ross said.

headline: Holiday shoppers expect less discounts in 2025: Here’s what the numbers say
summary: In the chase for value, consumers this season are more likely to purchase gifts via multibrand retail channels compared to brand-specific platforms.

raw.headline: Holiday shoppers expect less discounts in 2025: Here’s what the numbers say
raw.summary: In the chase for value, consumers this season are more likely to purchase gifts via multibrand retail channels compared to brand-specific platforms.

headline: Gartner Stock: Is IT Underperforming the Technology Sector?
summary: Gartner has significantly underperformed the broader technology sector over the past year, and analysts remain cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
